text.text_translated: Julie Wong is a very important expert. She studies Robotics and AI. Robotics is about making and using robots. AI helps computers think and learn like people. She wrote more than 50 papers for important science magazines. She often speaks at meetings for experts in different countries. In 2012, she got a very important prize. The prize was the Simone Fielding award from a top science group. Julie lives with her family in a smart home. She made the plan for the house herself.
